modName: Bow and Arrow HD Retex - Long - Hunting - Imperial Bow and Iron and Steel Quiver
summary: Small mod that is an HD Retexture of the Iron Quiver and Arrows, Steel Quiver and Arrows, and the Hunting, Imperial, and Wooden Bows
descriptionHtml:
UPDATE 7/26/12:
Glass Bow and Quiver added! 2 varieties to choose from
1) Default Vanilla Style
2) Morrowind Style - this version will have less shine but a mild glow to the glass parts, as well as added transparency in appropriate places

If you want the Morrowind-style armor seen in the pics, then you can download it here:
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/4859/?tab=2&navtag=/ajax/modimages/?user=0|:|id=4859]More Morrowind Like Glass Armor Texture by JESSETIN3[/url]

LOW LEVEL BOW AND ARROW HD RETEX

Small mod that I wanted to do because I do enjoy playing with the more organic weapons in the game, iron, steel, wood, leather, etc. , and the originals I thought could stand to be improved. 

This mod gives you  an HD retex of the following items:

Iron Quiver and Arrows
Steel Quiver and Arrows
Wooden Bow
Hunting Bow
Imperial Bow (2 options – vanilla style and imperial style)

Default mod has all this and the Imperial Bow in the “vanilla style” which is a more traditional wood color similar to the Hunting Bow.  The Imperial Style I did just because it is an “Imperial” Bow and I thought it went better with the Imperial armors and clothing.

All diffuse, normal, specular, and environment maps have been changed.  The resolution of the diffuse and normal maps was upped to 2k x 2k or 2k x 1k for all except the wooden bow which I did at 1k x 1k.  The environment maps (only for the Hunting Bow and Steel Quiver) were kept small.

Installation: 
1)	Use NMM
or
2)	Drop the “data” folder into your Skyrim folder

If you want the alternative “Imperial” style Imperial Bow, which is a bit more rich and red in color, then either drop the “data” folder for that in your Skyrim folder, or use the NMM install which will simply install that over the default Imperial Bow.

Uninstallation:
Use NMM 
Or 
Delete the installed files from 
Data/textures/weapons/wooden
Data/textures/weapons/steel
Data/textures/weapons/iron

Enjoy!

CREDITS:
The Nexus Staff and Community
Bethesda
Photoshop
Shutterstock for images of wood, metal, leather, etc.
Nifskope
Bellyache for teaching me Photoshop ;)
And Thanks to regaz for his tutorial video on youtube as about 6 months ago I had never made a mod and that tutorial showed me how to get started ;)
author: XRC
